message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. Considering its value and quality, I propose a price of $95. This is a great opportunity to own something worth $100 at a reasonable discount.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount, but $95 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to pay $85 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a more attractive offer. Considering the value of the product and your willingness to pay, I am willing to sell it to you for $90.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $90 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to pay $87.50 for the product. This is a fair price, considering the value of the product and my willingness to buy it from you.
I see your point, Bob. I'm glad we're finding common ground here. Considering the value of the product and your willingness to pay, I am willing to sell it to you for $89.
